name: drag
description: Mass-drag users between voice channels. Specify either a 'from' voice channel or set 'all' to true.

options.name: all
options.description: Move users from all voice channels into a specific voice channel.

options.name: to
options.description: Voice channel to drag users into.

options.name: between
options.description: Drag users in one voice channel to another.

options.name: to
options.description: Voice channel to drag users into.

options.name: from
options.description: Voice channel to drag users FROM.
